page.title: 05 WEEDON'S GARAGES.
page.content: Opposite our school are two garages. We went to talk to their owners. *** LOOK CARS *** Look Cars only sells cars,they sell about six cars a week.Their most expensive cars cost 2000 pounds,their cheapest cars cost about 900 pounds. The best car they ever sold was a {Rolls Royce}.Sometimes people steal radios and cars.They buy all their cars from other garages. *** BEWLEY'S GARAGE *** Mr Bewley repairs cars,he repairs four or five a day.His largest bill was 1012 pounds,his smallest was 26 pence. He works from about 09.00 until 19.00 hours.He told us he enjoys his work.His son helps him in the garage. **************** Other local garages include Freeways Motors,Ace Filling Station,Avon Motors and the Weedon Motor Company.
